description_for_human: Securely automates activity sign-ups for parents using a consent-first flow.
description_for_model: SignupAssist helps parents find and register for kids' activities. MANDATORY: When user expresses ANY intent to sign up, register, book, or find classes, you MUST call signupassist.start IMMEDIATELY in the SAME turn to show available programs. Do NOT ask intake questions before calling signupassist.start. Show programs FIRST, then ask follow-up questions.
